select sessions.session, sessions.start, sessions.end, history.source
from sessions 
join history using (session)
where start > '2022–11–20' and start < '2022–11–30';

select '# @@ Cell '|| line || char(10) || source || char(10) from history where session = 241;
select '# @@ Cell '|| line || char(10) || source || char(10) from history where session = 239;
